name: The Gatherer
description:
Adds The Gatherer as a new playable character with 75 cards, 8 relics.
- Requires Basemod, StSLib to run.

v0.4.0 - v0.4.1
- 2 new relics: FlyingFruit, Leftovers
- HP changed to 72 (was 64)
- Various text changes.
- Changes to list of Lesser Potions
- Buff: Centralize, Flower Falling, Flower Shield, Gather Material, Herbalism, Polymorphism, Scent of Rosmari, Smart Maneuver, Grow Book, Mind Search, Scroll of Purity, Lucky Clover
- Nerf: Heart to Fruit
- Changed: Photoscythe, Upgrade Bag
- Rework: Save Valuables

v0.4.2
- New relic: Explorer's Path
- Changes: Star Fruit, Misfortune, Enchant, Recipe Change, Solidify, Scroll of Purity, Poison Mastery
- Bug fix: Collector's Shot, Drug Power, Smart Maneuver, Stone Fence

- For more information, visit
https://github.com/Celicath/GathererMod/releases
